title: Sun Laboratories Tan Overnight Self Tanning Lotion 8 fl oz.
description: Sun Laboratories Tan Overnight lets you achieve an incredibly natural-looking bronzed appearance on the face and body without exposure to harmful UV sun rays - anytime, anywhere. Formulated with a natural blend of ingredients that promote hydration and a sugar derivative that enhances the skin's color, this formula is safe for all skin types seeking a dramatically deeper tone. An instant dose of color helps prevent streaks and patches, and the color is set within three hours of application.
